neu:sampleInfo.neu:title: Faces Sample C++
neu:sampleInfo.neu:description: The C++ Faces sample application demonstrates how to use enroll and/or identify faces in images retrieved from a file or a video stream. Using this sample application you can do the following:[br/] [b]Enroll subjects' face image.[/b][br/] [b]Enroll with generalization.[/b][br/] [b]Identify face image.[/b][br/] This sample application also allows to identify subject's face image against all database (makes 1:N matching). Faces sample application uses internal database. Application uses WxWidgets framework.
